title: DataStax Distribution of Apache Cassandra™ Deployment on Google Cloud Platform
description:
In this video you’ll see how to find the DataStax Distribution of Apache Cassandra in the Google Cloud Platform (GCP) Marketplace, basic configuration options, and creating a cluster allowing you to integrate with first party GCP services. Take advantage of this production-ready database supported by DataStax, the Apache Cassandra experts, that is 100% open source compatible. Your cluster will also include a development virtual machine allowing users to quickly realize the benefits and power of running and managing your data on GCP.


Get started with DataStax Distribution of Apache Cassandra on GCP:

8x5 Support: http://bit.ly/ddac_on_gcp_8x5

24x7 Support: http://bit.ly/ddac_on_gcp_24x7

 

Check out our docs for more detailed information: http://bit.ly/ddac_on_gcp_docs
